page.title: 10Sport.Football and Cricket.
page.content: Formed in 1886,Belford F.C. will hold various social functions in the coming centenary year.The 1st team play in the Northern Amateur League,which involves a lot of travelling in the Newcastle district.The 2nd team play in the North Northumberland League. Various fund_raising efforts help to maintain the 2 teams and pay for a new pavilion and changing facilities.The Club has had a lot of success over the years,reflected by the large number of trophies won by the players. Belford Cricket Club was formed at the end of the last century,and,after promotion last season,is now playing in the Northumberland B1 League despite problems in finding enough players,due to the fact that farm workers have difficulty in getting time off.The players themselves carry out any necessary pavilion repairs.
